dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5835 IH: To amend title 40, United States Code, to increase the mileage of the Appalachian Development Highway System to provide for improvements to and expansion of Corridor K in North Carolina, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Edwards introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To amend title 40, United States Code, to increase the mileage of the Appalachian Development Highway System to provide for improvements to and expansion of Corridor K in North Carolina, and for other purposes.

subsection.text: Section 14501(a) of title 40, United States Code, is amended, in the second sentence, by striking three thousand and ninety miles and inserting 3,105 miles.
The increase in mileage to the Appalachian Development Highway System made by the amendment made by subsection (a) shall be for improvements to and expansion of Corridor K in North Carolina.
